attributes.action: Provide free Astma Medication for Asmatics and also free Epipens for people that suffer from anaphylaxis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that it is unfair that asmatics and anaphylaxis sufferers have to pay for medication that is life saving when diabetics and epileptics get their medication for free. As a suffer from both asthma and anaphylaxis this is very expensive for me. Diabeties is a long term killer where as asthma and anaphylaxis are instant killers. I am not asking for you to make all medications free, just those prescribed for astham and anaphylaxis to be given to suffers free of charge.
